item.title: Specialized Tarmac SL6 Bike Building
item.description: Header It’s been a while since I tinkered with my bike. I just bought a roval aero handlebar recently and plan to run the cables internally to make it looks better. I disassembled the bike myself to try it out, but dealing with the Shimano 7020 setup with two hydraulic cables and two shift cables (a total of four lines) was quite a challenge. This led me to consider buying

item.title: Banff旅行游记
item.description: Header 最近妈妈来了加拿大，打算带她去Calgary和Banff旅行，发现Banff旅游真的好多坑啊，正好写一篇游记博客，顺便记录一下Banff旅

item.title: Algonquin旅行攻略
item.description: 常用链接 实时枫叶变色情况以及历史数据 预定门票，门票$21一天，可以提前5天预定 安省枫叶地图 阿冈昆公园地图 推荐的景点 周边： 白求恩故居 Lions Lookout Dorset Lookout Tower:

item.title: OINP移民加拿大🇨🇦时间线
item.description: Dec 25, 2022，硕士毕业 Jan 3, 2023，收到毕业信 Apr 27, 2023，收到CELPIP成绩，入池，其实毕业之前就该考出来的，没必要等着PGWP下来再申
